entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
